item.title: Resources in Operational Research
item.author: blog@joaojunior.org (Joao Junior)
item.description: I wrote a list of operational research resource which contains many name of books, events, groups, solvers and teachers. I publish this list here. It is a github’s repository and you can help to update :-) I wrote it based on the list, wrote by Avelino, about resources for go programming language.
